decks.notes: The deck focuses on filling the graveyard quickly with creatures, enabling the player to cast Hogaak, Arisen Necropolis as early as possible. It includes a variety of cards that allow for graveyard manipulation, such as Stitcher's Supplier and Fauna Shaman. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Vengevine and Finale of Devastation to put pressure on the opponent and close out the game quickly. The deck also includes removal and disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Abrupt Decay to control the board and protect the game plan. Overall, the key strategy is to quickly fill the graveyard, cast Hogaak, and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive threats.

The deck focuses on utilizing a variety of powerful spells and versatile cards to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy, while setting up for a game-winning combo using Kenrith, the Returned King. The deck includes removal spells like Dreadbore, Supreme Verdict, and Abrupt Decay to deal with threats, as well as versatile planeswalkers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Teferi, Time Raveler for card advantage and control. Additionally, the deck includes a mix of creatures like Baleful Strix and Huntmaster of the Fells for value and disruption. The goal is to disrupt the opponent's game plan, control the board, and assemble the combo pieces to secure the win.

The deck revolves around utilizing Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath as the commander to control the game through counterspells, card draw, and tempo plays. The deck includes a variety of removal spells, counterspells, and card draw effects to maintain control over the board and disrupt opponents' strategies. The inclusion of powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Oko, Thief of Crowns provides additional threats and disruption. Ultimately, the key strategy is to outvalue opponents with efficient card advantage and powerful threats while controlling the game with counterspells and removal. The deck aims to establish a dominant board presence and grind out victories through incremental advantage.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by using a combination of Counterspells, removal spells, and select enchantments to lock down the opponent's options while protecting its own resources. By utilizing Zur the Enchanter's ability to fetch powerful enchantments from the deck, the deck aims to establish a dominant position on the battlefield and dictate the pace of the game. It also includes a mix of card draw, hand disruption, and versatile utility spells to adapt to different situations and outmaneuver the opponent. Overall, the key strategy revolves around maintaining a proactive control over the game, denying the opponent's resources, and gradually building up towards a win condition through incremental advantage and efficient threat management.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay using a combination of artifacts and spells to control the board and pressure the opponent. The commanders, Silas Renn and Akiri, work together to provide card advantage and powerful equipment synergy. The deck includes a variety of efficient removal spells, versatile artifacts, and disruptive cards to disrupt the opponent's game plan. With a mix of card draw, tutoring, and strong threats, the deck aims to quickly establish a dominant board presence and overwhelm the opponent. By combining the strengths of the partner commanders and a diverse array of powerful cards, this deck is designed to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent in a fast-paced 1 vs 1 format.

This deck focuses on utilizing fast and aggressive creatures to quickly overwhelm your opponent. The goal is to continuously apply pressure with cards like Goblin Guide, Kari Zev, Skyship Raider, and Rampaging Ferocidon, while also utilizing powerful burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning to finish off your opponent. The deck includes efficient creatures with haste and pump effects to maintain a fast pace and push for a quick victory. With cards like Ash Zealot and Reckless Bushwhacker, you can flood the board with threats and close out the game before your opponent has a chance to stabilize. The strategy revolves around being proactive and relentless in your attacks to secure a win in a short amount of time.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent, aiming to win the game as fast as possible. Klothys, God of Destiny serves as both a disruption tool against graveyard strategies and a source of additional devotion for the commander's ability. The deck includes efficient threats like Robber of the Rich, Glorybringer, and Questing Beast, as well as powerful burn spells like Lightning Bolt, Searing Blaze, and Thunderbolt to help finish off opponents. Additionally, the deck includes mana accelerants like Birds of Paradise and Zhur-Taa Druid to ramp up and play threats ahead of schedule. By combining aggressive creatures with burn spells and mana ramp, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents before they can stabilize.

This deck focuses on a highly efficient and versatile aggro strategy using the partner commanders Tymna the Weaver and Thrasios, Triton Hero. The key concept lies in maintaining control of the board while pushing damage through evasive creatures, removal spells, and disruptive countermagic. The deck utilizes a wide range of powerful cards such as Liliana, the Last Hope, Teferi, Time Raveler, and True-Name Nemesis to disrupt opponents' strategies and maintain pressure. By combining a strong aggro game plan with flexible disruption and card advantage, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents quickly and efficiently in a 1 vs 1 Duel Commander format, utilizing the versatility and synergy of the WUBG color combination.
